definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: They peeped out stealthily from a corner of the wall.
sentences.chinese: 他們幾個在牆角處鬼頭鬼腦地往外探望。

sentences.english: This sneaky girl was disliked by the rest of the class.
sentences.chinese: 全班剩餘的同學都不喜歡這個鬼頭鬼腦的女孩。

sentences.english: He looked like a shifty underworld character.
sentences.chinese: 他看起來是個鬼頭鬼腦的下流社會的角色。
